message.content: {"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor", "description": "When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes used for selecting projects should display a busy cursor during the updating process.", "OB": "When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects:", "EB": "The checkboxes used for selecting projects should display a busy cursor during the updating process.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Initiate the export Zip process. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose file types and select some. 5. Press ok."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
